Class LightLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.dpm16.LightLocalizer

  • public class LightLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class localizes the robot in the starting corner using the light sensor.
    Author:
    Reem

    • Method Detail

      • localize

        public void localize()
        main method that has the flow logic. First we rotate the robot by 375 to make sure we cross alll lines. we keep getting ensor readings and comparing the internsity different to catch the black lines when we have caught 4 black lines we proceed to calculate the offset by the methods provided in the tutorial we then correct the odometer reading and head to 0,0

      • pastline

        public boolean pastline()
        checking if we pased a line, by comparing the differences between readings if the difference ebtween the differences spiked, we have a line

      • lastNValueAdd

        public void lastNValueAdd(double value)
        adding to the array of readings

      • gotoEstimatedOrigin

        public void gotoEstimatedOrigin()
        method orientes towards the 45, advances a bit, turn back to the 0 degree to have a better chance of catching all the lines
